name: Odd Office
description:
Entry for the Interactive Experience Game Jam 2017 at the Pacific Science Center. Made in 48 hours. Theme was "What is reality?"

A tired and overworked office drone works late into the evening and struggles to maintain his grip on reality. Armed with nothing but a stapler,  he battles against his own imagination.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Click - Fire
  • R - Reload

Credits:

  • Joshua Soldate - 3D Modeling, Animation, Texturing, Voice Acting
  • Ed Lu - Programming
  • Andrew Hung - Programming, VFX
  • Robert Ackley - Programming, Level Design
  • Matt Boerner - Music, Sound, Writing, Voice Acting
  • Taylor Wood - Title Screen Song
